resources.string: We\'ll guide you through the setup of your device
If you\'d like to setup a CM Account, a Google Account or connect your phone to a WiFi network, the CM setup will guide you. If don\'t want to set something, you can skip the setup here.
If you have any questions, just ask. To support others that may have the same question, we\'ll answer your questions in the CyanDream thread of your device.
But before we are, you\'ll have to select the type of builds you\'d like to search updates for.
